short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a guide column to the games list with difficulty and hour from official guide to make deciding your next hunt easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a new column with difficulty and hours from the featured guide to the games list to make deciding your next hunt easier.
